entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming east 20 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
